backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing reminders with CRUD operations and filters for active and completed items.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping rollback-related features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and purpose of various frontend application files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining light and dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads React and applies dark mode early based on stored customization settings.
frontend/public/study-planner-mockup.htm: Standalone HTML mockup demonstrating themed UI layout and styling for the Study Planner.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup that triggers rollback reconciliation before rendering and defines all application routes.
frontend/src/components/AddChapterDialog: Dialog component for adding a chapter with form inputs for name, lectures, and hours.
frontend/src/components/AllChaptersBySub: Displays all chapters grouped by subject with status-based sectioning and counts.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedIcon.tsx: Wraps a Lucide icon with optional active animation and sizing.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Provides a React error boundary with UI for showing errors, stack traces, and recovery actions.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar containing the SubjectsBar.
frontend/src/components/ChapterCard.tsx: Shows a chapter card with status, timers, and controls for starting, pausing, and stopping work.
frontend/src/components/ChapterDetailPan: Sheet panel for editing chapter details, hours, lectures, and status with inline form controls.
frontend/src/components/DashboardComplet: Renders a bar chart showing chapter completion percentages per subject.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout including header, navigation, customization panel, and identity controls.
frontend/src/components/MonthGridCalenda: Renders a month-view calendar grid with navigation and optional day indicators. Calculates dates across previous, current, and next months to fill the grid.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsSec: Displays incomplete chapters, todos, and today's calendar entries with counts. Pulls data from multiple hooks and organizes them into notification lists.
frontend/src/components/OverallPerforman: Computes test score trends using linear regression and renders a performance chart. Shows average percentage, recent scores, and trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Adds a fade transition when the route changes. Tracks path changes and toggles opacity during transitions.
Manages subject-specific resources with add and delete actions. Displays a list of resources and a form to create new ones.
frontend/src/components/RollbackTargetSa: Provides a confirmation dialog requiring explicit version input before rollback. Validates user input and blocks unsafe rollback actions.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkDial: Shows a dialog for sharing the current app URL with copy-to-clipboard support. Includes a link to open the app in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/SubjectCompletio: Displays subject completion stats with an animated progress bar and per‑chapter completion grid tracking newly completed chapters.
frontend/src/components/SubjectDeleteBut: Provides a delete button with a confirmation dialog and toast feedback for removing a subject.
frontend/src/components/SubjectsBar.tsx: Renders a horizontal subject navigation bar with add/delete subject actions and active subject highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SubjectsSelector: Implements a popover dropdown for selecting or creating subjects with inline validation.
frontend/src/components/TasksDrawer.tsx: A slide‑in drawer offering navigation links and a subject‑scoped todo list with add, toggle, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/TestScoreChart.t: Renders a responsive SVG chart showing test scores as a line or bar graph with scaling, gridlines, and data points.
frontend/src/components/TodoList.tsx: Renders a to‑do list for a subject with add, toggle, and delete functionality using the useTodos hook.
frontend/src/customization/applyDarkMode: Applies light or dark mode by toggling the root HTML class based on override settings.
frontend/src/customization/Customization: Small settings button that triggers opening the customization panel.
Right‑side settings panel allowing users to adjust theme, study goals, playback speed, and other customization options.
Provides customization settings context, syncing settings and applying dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/src/customization/integration.t: Utility functions for notifications, sleep window checks, chapter card density, and study time calculations.
frontend/src/customization/settingsModel: Defines customization settings schema, default values, and validation for persisted settings.
frontend/src/customization/useCustomizat: Manages saving, loading, applying, and deleting named customization presets in localStorage.
Loads, persists, updates, and resets user customization settings with versioned localStorage support.
frontend/src/data/chapters.ts: Defines chapter structure and provides an initial list of chapters with lecture counts and statuses.
frontend/src/data/subjects.ts: Defines subjects, maps subjects to icons, and includes helpers for icon lookup and legacy routing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEntries.ts: Manages calendar entries with localStorage persistence, providing CRUD functions keyed by date.
frontend/src/hooks/useChapterData.ts: Loads, saves, updates, and syncs chapter data across tabs with versioning and status updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTarget.ts: Stores and retrieves a single countdown target date in localStorage with validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts: Computes live countdown time to a target date and updates every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdownTimers.ts: Handles multiple countdown timers with schema validation, migration, selection, and robust localStorage management.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentlyWorkingCh: Tracks per‑chapter work sessions with timers, pause/resume state, migration, and cross‑tab syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardNote.ts: Stores a dashboard note in localStorage and syncs updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardTitle.ts: Manages a persistent dashboard title with versioned localStorage storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity login, identity loading, state tracking, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Manages a list of notes with localStorage persistence and functions to add, update, and delete notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a placeholder React hook for backend queries and currently just returns actor state from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResources.ts: Manages subject-specific resources with localStorage persistence and migration from legacy formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyLog.ts: Stores and updates study log entries in localStorage and triggers sleep-window warnings based on settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjectDetails.ts: Handles per-subject metadata with versioned localStorage and functions to get and update details.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubjects.ts: Manages the subjects list with migration from older storage formats and supports add, delete, and lookup.
frontend/src/hooks/useTests.ts: Maintains a collection of tests and scores with localStorage, supporting CRUD operations and chart settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodos.ts: Provides subject-scoped todo storage with legacy migration and localStorage syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodosAll.ts: Loads and watches all todos across subjects by listening to localStorage changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode colors, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/appLocalStorage.ts: Defines all app-specific localStorage keys and provides helpers to clear or retrieve them.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Stores version metadata for v37 and manages rollback target validation and persistence.
frontend/src/lib/rollbackRestore.ts: Controls rollback-to-v37 logic, including activation, reconciliation, and state tracking using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarDashboard.tsx: Implements a calendar dashboard with month navigation and per-day work item CRUD operations.
frontend/src/pages/CountdownTimer.manual: Manual QA checklist covering creation, editing, deletion, and persistence of countdown timers.
frontend/src/pages/CountdownTimer.tsx: UI and logic for managing multiple countdown timers, including selection, editing, deletion, and target date updates.
frontend/src/pages/Customize.tsx: Customization panel for subjects, appearance settings, presets, and rollback-to-v37 controls.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing stats, active chapters, editable title and note, and charts using various hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Notes page providing CRUD operations for user notes with editing, viewing, and deletion UI.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectPage.tsx: Subject detail page displaying chapters, subject metadata, editing tools, and work‑tracking controls.
frontend/src/pages/Tests.tsx: Tests page managing tests, scores, charts, and editing/creation flows for performance tracking.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking rollback‑related requirements, known issues, and feature definitions.
